S.FORM: izua za tjawcikel na sepaiwan a mayatucu. kasicuayan aza 'adav a cemas namangetjez ikacauan, sa 'emecilu tu drusa,
izoa za tjawcikel na sepaiwan a mayatoco. kasicoayan aza 'adav a cemas namangetjez ikacaoan, sa 'emecilo to drosa,

manu djumaken na macidilj a kikasikasiv a cawcau, kacuin a pasauma' sa pitjaladji ta djilung a ljemengua', manu izua ka ita 'adav, mapatjeljar ta tjeljar na 'adav aza drusa 'ecilu i tjaladj ta djilung,

mano djomaken na macidilj a kikasikasiv a cawcao, kacoin a pasaoma' sa pitjaladji ta djilong a ljemengoa', mano izoa ka ita 'adav, mapatjeljar ta tjeljar na 'adav aza drosa 'ecilo i tjaladj ta djilong,
manu venuak ta macidilj a u'aljay kata macidilj a vavayan. aza drusa a 'ecilu, pai aicu a u'aljay kata vavayan mavananga sevalitan na paiwan aya.
mano venoak ta macidilj a o'aljay kata macidilj a vavayan. aza drosa a 'ecilo, pai aico a o'aljay kata vavayan mavananga sevalitan na paiwan aya.
aza masanitjaljanga a pakatua djilung a milimilingan namayatucu, izua ita 'adav kacemalivat i kavulungan a 'adav, manu djemumak ta nguangua' aravac a ita djilung i padayin,
aza masanitjaljanga a pakatoa djilong a milimilingan namayatoco, izoa ita 'adav kacemalivat i kavolongan a 'adav, mano djemomak ta ngoangoa' aravac a ita djilong i padayin,
pai 'emcilu a pitjaladj ta djilung, sa'ivu ta marecekelj a kamavanan tu ljemakev ta djilung, manu venuak ta macidjilj a vavayan aza 'ecilu,
pai 'emcilo a pitjaladj ta djilong, sa'ivo ta marecekelj a kamavanan to ljemakev ta djilong, mano venoak ta macidjilj a vavayan aza 'ecilo,
aicu a vavayan mavananga sevalitan na sepaiwan aya, 'au aicu a kamavanan namasan ljemakeljakev a cemas na paiwan kata namasan pazangazangal a vecik na paiwan.
aico a vavayan mavananga sevalitan na sepaiwan aya, 'ao aico a kamavanan namasan ljemakeljakev a cemas na paiwan kata namasan pazangazangal a vecik na paiwan.

manasika aicu a tjawcikel na sepaiwan a pakatua djilung, mavana kinaizuanan na tjasevalitan i kacauan aya, a tja'alja'aljan nu 'ivu, nu uri lemindjelj ta va'uan a 'inaljan a mamazangiljan, tjara pakaizua sakamaya ta djilung,

manasika aico a tjawcikel na sepaiwan a pakatoa djilong, mavana kinaizoanan na tjasevalitan i kacaoan aya, a tja'alja'aljan no 'ivo, no ori lemindjelj ta va'oan a 'inaljan a mamazangiljan, tjara pakaizoa sakamaya ta djilong,

ayatua aicu a djilung makaya a ljemakev tua tja'inaljan tua tjakinacemkeljan aya mamazangiljan nu'ivu, manasika kemasi cuay izua sakamaya tjawcikel a pakatua djilung na i pasaviri a paiwan, 'aw aicu a djilung liav a rinukunukuz a pitjuma' a mareka mamazangiljan

ayatoa aico a djilong makaya a ljemakev toa tja'inaljan toa tjakinacemkeljan aya mamazangiljan no'ivo, manasika kemasi coay izoa sakamaya tjawcikel a pakatoa djilong na i pasaviri a paiwan, 'aw aico a djilong liav a rinokonokoz a pitjoma' a mareka mamazangiljan
aicu a djilung sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan, nu tjaliav a rinukuz a djilung tjamakeljang tu tjapuanema, saka naljiavavav a 'iniladjan itua kinamamazangiljanan niamadju.
aico a djilong sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan, no tjaliav a rinokoz a djilong tjamakeljang to tjapoanema, saka naljiavavav a 'iniladjan itoa kinamamazangiljanan niamadjo.
kasicuayan amin a mamazangiljan mana makaya kipudjilung, ljakua tucuanga ini ka manu amin a mamazangiljan a makaya a kipudjilung, ayata tjuruvuanga maca'u a masengseng ta djilung tucu.
kasicoayan amin a mamazangiljan mana makaya kipodjilong, ljakoa tocoanga ini ka mano amin a mamazangiljan a makaya a kipodjilong, ayata tjorovoanga maca'o a masengseng ta djilong toco.
'aw aicu a pakatua kinasizuan na djilung, kemeljang a mapuljat a i pasaviri a paiwan, izua angata a pacacapiljan pacacapilj kata sicuayan a tjaucikel kata milimilingan na sevalitan,
'aw aico a pakatoa kinasizoan na djilong, kemeljang a mapoljat a i pasaviri a paiwan, izoa angata a pacacapiljan pacacapilj kata sicoayan a tjaocikel kata milimilingan na sevalitan,
aicu a mareka masengsengseng tua djilung, nu malalang tua djilung, tjara vencik ta kamavanan ta tjeljar na 'adav a papi a pipalingulj ta djilung,
aico a mareka masengsengseng toa djilong, no malalang toa djilong, tjara vencik ta kamavanan ta tjeljar na 'adav a papi a pipalingolj ta djilong,
aza patarevan sinipa'aljay katua kipa'enetj katua ljemakev siniayan.
aza patarevan sinipa'aljay katoa kipa'enetj katoa ljemakev siniayan.
'aw aicu a djilung maretimaljimalji, a sinanpazangal na sepaiwan a mamazangiljan, a tjaljavavavavavan a kakaleva kakavelian a djilung mavan a dredretan.
'aw aico a djilong maretimaljimalji, a sinanpazangal na sepaiwan a mamazangiljan, a tjaljavavavavavan a kakaleva kakavelian a djilong mavan a dredretan.
